displayName.text: N.Y. Golden Dragon Gifts Trading Inc.

formattedAddress: 176 Hester St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 176 Hester St, New York, NY 10013-5503, USA

originalText.text: The owner of the store cursed in Chinese word (I am Korean by the way) just because asked for discount. So I cursed him back. The funny thing is that he is doing business in China town. Let’s please respect each others.

text.text: The owner of the store cursed in Chinese word (I am Korean by the way) just because asked for discount. So I cursed him back. The funny thing is that he is doing business in China town. Let’s please respect each others.

originalText.text: Don’t go!!! Avoid this shop.!! Will ruin your day!!! Shop is open as 7/17/2023. Not temporary closed. Rather not give any star. Horrible customer service! So rude and disrespectful!! He need to understand that customers is key of his business. That Bussiness is not gonna las long.

originalText.text:
On my holiday I wanted to buy two postcards for my family, but unfortunately I didn't have any cash I wanted to pay whit the card... is then when the seller started to be rude and verbally aggressive...
You could just let me know that only cash in your shop... anyway I find the same postcards in a shop next to yours where the seller was professionally and friendly.
I give one star just because there is less than this.

originalText.text:
The worst experience ever like costumer. The seller was unprofessional and quite rude just because my friend didn't have any cash, and we wanted to pay whit the card.
Whit all the shops that you can find around I highly recommend avoid shopping here!
